channel.title: Fig on Ed Zynda - Coder, Hacker, Superhero

item.title: The PHP Renaissance: FIG and PSRs
item.description: If you worked with PHP in the early days or even if you are a newcomer, you are probably familiar with how messy and painful working with another developer’s code can be. PHP has a low barrier to entry which is great for getting things done. At the same time though, it creates a culture of lazy developers. Even those developers with years of experience have coding styles that are hard to wade through.
